mapper.select: SELECT LOST_IDX, MEMBERS.NICKNAME, LOST_TITLE, TO_CHAR(LOST_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') LOST_DATE, L_VIEWS, LOCATIONS.SIDO_NAME||' '||LOCATIONS.GUGUN_NAME LOCATION, SUBSTR(ITEMS.ITEM, INSTR(ITEMS.ITEM, '-') + 1) ITEM, REWARD, COLORS.COLOR_NAME FROM LOST_ITEMS LEFT JOIN MEMBERS USING(EMAIL) LEFT JOIN LOCATIONS USING(LOCATION_CODE) LEFT JOIN ITEMS USING(ITEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN COLORS USING(COLOR_CODE) WHERE LOST_STATE = 2 ORDER BY LOST_DATE DESC OFFSET #{arg0} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{arg1} ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM ITEMS WHERE ITEM NOT LIKE('%-%') ORDER BY ITEM_CODE ASC
SELECT * FROM ITEMS WHERE ITEM LIKE('%-%') AND ITEM_CODE LIKE('${code}__') ORDER BY ITEM_CODE ASC
SELECT * FROM COLORS ORDER BY COLOR_CODE ASC
SELECT LOCATION_CODE, SIDO_NAME FROM LOCATIONS WHERE GUGUN_NAME IS NULL ORDER BY LOCATION_CODE ASC

SELECT LOCATION_CODE, LOCATIONS.SIDO_NAME, GUGUN_NAME FROM LOCATIONS, (SELECT SIDO_NAME FROM LOCATIONS WHERE LOCATION_CODE = #{location_code}) SIDO_T WHERE GUGUN_NAME IS NOT NULL AND SIDO_T.SIDO_NAME = LOCATIONS.SIDO_NAME ORDER BY LOCATION_CODE ASC

SELECT LOST_IDX, MEMBERS.NICKNAME, LOST_TITLE, TO_CHAR(LOST_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') LOST_DATE, L_VIEWS, LOCATIONS.SIDO_NAME||' '||LOCATIONS.GUGUN_NAME LOCATION, SUBSTR(ITEMS.ITEM, INSTR(ITEMS.ITEM, '-') + 1) ITEM, REWARD, COLOR_CODE FROM LOST_ITEMS LEFT JOIN MEMBERS USING(EMAIL) LEFT JOIN LOCATIONS USING(LOCATION_CODE) LEFT JOIN ITEMS USING(ITEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN COLORS USING(COLOR_CODE) WHERE LOST_STATE = 2
AND LOST_TITLE LIKE('%${lost_title}%')
AND ITEM_CODE = TO_NUMBER(#{item_code})
AND LOCATION_CODE = TO_NUMBER(#{ location_code })
AND LOST_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND LOST_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND COlOR_CODE = TO_NUMBER(#{color_code})
ORDER BY LOST_DATE DESC OFFSET #{arg0} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{arg1} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LOST_ITEMS LEFT JOIN MEMBERS USING(EMAIL) LEFT JOIN LOCATIONS USING(LOCATION_CODE) LEFT JOIN ITEMS USING(ITEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN COLORS USING(COLOR_CODE) WHERE LOST_STATE = 2
AND LOST_TITLE LIKE('%${lost_title}%')
AND ITEM_CODE = TO_NUMBER(#{item_code})
AND LOCATION_CODE = TO_NUMBER(#{ location_code })
AND LOST_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND LOST_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND COlOR_CODE = TO_NUMBER(#{color_code})

SELECT LOST_IDX, MEMBERS.NICKNAME, LOST_TITLE, LOST_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(LOST_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') LOST_DATE, L_VIEWS, LOCATIONS.SIDO_NAME||' '||LOCATIONS.GUGUN_NAME LOCATION, SUBSTR(ITEMS.ITEM, INSTR(ITEMS.ITEM, '-') + 1) ITEM, REWARD, COLORS.COLOR_NAME, TO_CHAR(L_REG_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') L_REG_DATE FROM LOST_ITEMS LEFT JOIN MEMBERS USING(EMAIL) LEFT JOIN LOCATIONS USING(LOCATION_CODE) LEFT JOIN ITEMS USING(ITEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN COLORS USING(COLOR_CODE) WHERE LOST_STATE = 2 ORDER BY LOST_DATE DESC
